attributes.action: Make public transport free for NHS nurses in London
attributes.background: Public transport and cost of living is extremely expensive in London. NHS nurses are not well paid for such an important job and free transport would make a great difference

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. It is the responsibility of TfL, which is accountable to the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
